derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, from late Latin catacumbas, the name of the subterranean cemetery of St Sebastian near Rome

entry.tran: (尤指城市下方的古代)地下墓道，地下墓室
entry.def: Catacombs are ancient underground passages and rooms, especially under a city, where people used to be buried.

means.word_mean: 1. an underground tunnel with recesses where bodies were buried (as in ancient Rome)
